section-hero.h2: An open online dispute resolution platform bringing justice for all.

first.title: Peer-to-Peer
first.paragraph: A global community of users serving as jurors.

second.title: Advanced Cryptoeconomics
second.paragraph: Blockchain and game theroy bring fast, affordable and fair decisions.

third.title: Multi Purpose
third.paragraph: Kleros works in a wide variety of industries.

section-2.h2: As the economy becomes global and digital, disputes arise in many areas that cannot be sovled by courts or traditional arbitration systems. Kleros can solve them in a fast, affordable and secure way.

section-3.h2: You send your cases. Kleros sends back a decision.

card-1.title: Join as a Juror
card-1.paragraph: Earn money and bring justice to the world.

card-2.title: Integrate your Platform
card-2.paragraph: Learn how you can Kleros to solve in your platform.
